LanguageData.Bullet_Lynx.label: pistol bullet
LanguageData.GD_Lynx.label: tactical pistol
LanguageData.GD_Lynx.description: A Greydale Defense "Lynx". Light and easy to use, ideal personal defense weapon. It use small-caliber, high-velocity armor-piercing cartridge.
LanguageData.Bullet_GRC.label: carbine bullet
LanguageData.GD_GRC.label: tactical carbine
LanguageData.GD_GRC.description: A Greydale Defense "panther" general purpose rifle platform. This is a carbine model.
LanguageData.Bullet_GRM.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.GD_GRM.label: marksman rifle
LanguageData.GD_GRM.description: A Greydale Defense "panther" general purpose rifle platform. This is a marksman rifle model.
LanguageData.Bullet_GRS.label: carbine bullet
LanguageData.GD_GRS.label: support machinegun
LanguageData.GD_GRS.description: A Greydale Defense "panther" general purpose rifle platform. This is a LMG model.
LanguageData.Bullet_Jaguar.label: grenade
LanguageData.GD_Jaguar.label: grenade launcher
LanguageData.GD_Jaguar.description: Designed by Greydale Defense, the "Jaguar" is a simple but effective indirect fire support weapon.
LanguageData.Bullet_Caracal.label: pistol bullet
LanguageData.GD_Caracal.label: HV SMG
LanguageData.GD_Caracal.description: The "Caracal" is a SMG that manufactured by Graydale Defence. It was designed for close assault and fires special small calibre high velocity cartridges that can penetrate armour.
